title: Delicato in action -- literally
content:
It’s a testament to [Stefan Hattenbach](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011170127/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stefan%252BHattenbach)’s type designing skillz that his [Delicato](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011170127/http:/www.fountain.nu/catalogue/delicato.asp) remains perfectly legible [even in adverse conditions](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011170127/http:/typophile.com/node/19710).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011170127im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Troubleman_Paris_6440.jpg)

_Photograph by [Jean François Porchez](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011170127/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jean%252BFran%2525C3%2525A7ois%252BPorchez)._
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: Woohoo! RNRMF. When is Troubleman coming to my town? Please put me on the guest list :)
Yves, are you wearing glasses? Ehehe. RNRMF indeed! :^)
Nah, that’s just the reflection in my contact lenses I guess. :^P
It is the blinding light of Rock n Roll!
